title: 37: Adopting Blockchain
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: We are joined by Dr. Feng Han, co-founder of Elastos and visiting scholar at Columbia University, to talk about his expertise in blockchain.  We cover how blockchain can be adopted to help to inform consumers about the products they consume and how it can act as reassurance in communication and transactions.  We also talk about how it might be adopted at a larger scale.  Hosted by Yudong Rao, Yin Yu, and Professor David Just.
